story.title: As a user I want to buy some items and check rozetka_backet So that So that I go to ItemPage and add product to cart

scenario.title: 1 quick_purchase
scenario.step: Then Item at position 1 has quantity 1

scenario.title: 2 simple_purchase
scenario.step: Then Item at position 1 has quantity 1
And Item name is the same as it was on the item's page

scenario.title: 3 delete_item
scenario.step: Given Opened start_catalog with cart fulfilled with quantity 2 of first element from start_catalog
When Click on cart button on menu bar

scenario.title: 4 increase_quantity (“+”)
scenario.step: Given Opened start_catalog with cart fulfilled with quantity 2 of first element from start_catalog
When Click on cart button on menu bar
Then Item at position 1 has quantity 3
And Item name is the same as it was on the item's page

scenario.title: 5 decrease quantity (“-”)
scenario.step: Given Opened start_catalog with cart fulfilled with quantity 2 of first element from start_catalog
When Click on cart button on menu bar
Then Item at position 1 has quantity 1
And Item name is the same as it was on the item's page

scenario.title: 6 enter_quantity_by_keyboard (correct value)
scenario.step: Then Item at position 1 has quantity 10
And Item name is the same as it was on the item's page

scenario.title: 7 enter_quantity_by_keyboard (incorrect value)
scenario.step: Then Item at position 1 has quantity abc
And Item name is the same as it was on the item's page
